org.sd.classifier
Class ArffTranslator

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.classifier.ArffVisitor
      org.sd.classifier.ArffTranslator
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArffAttributePruner, ArffBagCollapser
public abstract class ArffTranslator
extends ArffVisitor

Base utility for translating one arff to another.

This class is NOT thread safe at this level. An instance per file to translate is necessary.

Author:
Spence Koehler

runPreAttributeVisitHook

protected final boolean runPreAttributeVisitHook(FeatureDictionary featureDictionary,
                                                 java.util.List<FeatureAttribute> featureAttributes)
Hook to run (override) for performing operations before iterating over attributes.

Overrides:
runPreAttributeVisitHook in class ArffVisitor
Returns:
true to iterate over attributes, false to skip.

visitFeatureAttribute

protected abstract boolean visitFeatureAttribute(FeatureDictionary featureDictionary,
                                                 FeatureAttribute featureAttribute,
                                                 int attributeIndex)
Visit the given featureAttribute. For a translator, this means to alter attributes in the feature dictionary as appropriate for the translated file as pertains to the current featureAttribute (i.e. remove, rename, change range, etc.).

Specified by:
visitFeatureAttribute in class ArffVisitor
Returns:
true to keep iterating, false to stop iterating over attributes.

runPostAttributeVisitHook

protected final void runPostAttributeVisitHook(FeatureDictionary featureDictionary,
                                               java.util.List<FeatureAttribute> featureAttributes,
                                               int lastAttributeIndex)
Hook to run (override) for performing operations after iterating over attributes.

This is only called if runPreAttributeVisitHook returned true.

Overrides:
runPostAttributeVisitHook in class ArffVisitor

runPreDictionaryWriteHook

protected boolean runPreDictionaryWriteHook(FeatureDictionary featureDictionary,
                                            java.util.List<FeatureAttribute> featureAttributes,
                                            int lastAttributeIndex)
Hook to run (override) for cleaning up after all attributes have been visited, but before the dictionary is written to the new arff file.

For example, if the values for an attribute have changed or been reduced, here would be the place to fix them.

Returns:
true to write the heading; false to skip writing.

                                        java.util.List<FeatureAttribute> featureAttributes)

Returns:

visitFeatureVector

protected final boolean visitFeatureVector(FeatureDictionary featureDictionary,
                                           java.util.List<FeatureAttribute> featureAttributes,
                                           java.lang.String instanceLine,
                                           int instanceNum)
Visit the given feature vector's instance line.

An implementation can call the visitVectorValues method and override the visitVectorValue method.

Specified by:
visitFeatureVector in class ArffVisitor
Returns:
true to keep iterating, false to stop iterating over attributes.

getTranslatedVectorValue

protected abstract java.lang.String getTranslatedVectorValue(FeatureDictionary featureDictionary,

                                                             java.lang.String instanceLine,
                                                             int instanceNum,
                                                             int attributeNum,

Get the translated vector value, where null indicates that the value is to be removed.

Returns:
the translated value, possibly null to signal deletion.
